## WorkerServiceProtocol namespace

Common communication protocol for \[\[WorkerService\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare namespace WorkerServiceProtocol 
```

## Enumerations

|  Enumeration | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [Requests](./harp-datasource-protocol.workerserviceprotocol.requests.md) | Define possible names of requests called on services within <code>WebWorker</code>. |
|  [ServiceMessageName](./harp-datasource-protocol.workerserviceprotocol.servicemessagename.md) | Define possible names of messages exchanged with services within <code>WebWorker</code>. |

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [isInitializedMessage(message)](./harp-datasource-protocol.workerserviceprotocol.isinitializedmessage.md) | Type guard to check if an object is a signal message from worker. |
|  [isRequestMessage(message)](./harp-datasource-protocol.workerserviceprotocol.isrequestmessage.md) | Type guard to check if an object is a request message sent to a worker. |
|  [isResponseMessage(message)](./harp-datasource-protocol.workerserviceprotocol.isresponsemessage.md) | Type guard to check if an object is a request message sent to a worker. |
|  [isUnknownServiceError(error)](./harp-datasource-protocol.workerserviceprotocol.isunknownserviceerror.md) | Test if <code>error</code> thrown by \[\[CreateServiceRequest\]\] was caused by unknown type of service. |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [CreateServiceRequest](./harp-datasource-protocol.workerserviceprotocol.createservicerequest.md) | This message is sent by the main thread to \[\[WorkerServiceManager\]\] to dynamically create a new service.<!-- -->May throw <code>UnknownServiceError</code> if service of given type is not registered in \[\[WorkerServiceManager\]\], see \[\[isUnknownServiceError\]\]. |
|  [DestroyServiceRequest](./harp-datasource-protocol.workerserviceprotocol.destroyservicerequest.md) | This message is sent by the main thread to \[\[WorkerServiceManager\]\] to dynamically destroy a service. |
|  [InitializedMessage](./harp-datasource-protocol.workerserviceprotocol.initializedmessage.md) | This message is sent by the worker to the main thread. No data is sent. Receiving this message confirms that the worker has started successfully. |
|  [RequestMessage](./harp-datasource-protocol.workerserviceprotocol.requestmessage.md) | This message is a part of the Request-Response scheme implemented to be used in communication between workers and the decoder. |
|  [ResponseMessage](./harp-datasource-protocol.workerserviceprotocol.responsemessage.md) | This message is a part of the Request-Response scheme implemented to be used in communication between workers and the decoder. |
|  [ServiceMessage](./harp-datasource-protocol.workerserviceprotocol.servicemessage.md) | Interface for <code>ServiceMessage</code> which describes metadata for a service messages. |
|  [ServiceRequest](./harp-datasource-protocol.workerserviceprotocol.servicerequest.md) | This is an internal general interface used in communication with workers. Check \[\[ConcurrentWorkerSet\]\]'s invokeRequest function for exemplary usage. |

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [WORKER\_SERVICE\_MANAGER\_SERVICE\_ID](./harp-datasource-protocol.workerserviceprotocol.worker_service_manager_service_id.md) | Service id of worker manager (\[\[WorkerServiceManager\]\]) used to create/destroy service instances in workers. |

|  Type Alias | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [WorkerServiceManagerRequest](./harp-datasource-protocol.workerserviceprotocol.workerservicemanagerrequest.md) | Possible service management messages (<code>CreateService</code> or <code>DestroyService</code>) sent to WebWorker. |
